title: Hospital at work
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Children - Hospital care

description: When Michelle is admitted to hospital to have her tonsils removed, she is treated with kindness and sympathy. A doctor reassuringly explains what will happen in the operating theatre. Also shown are other areas of the hospital, and other activities and equipment. Suitable for primary school level.
